scripts.build: npm run build-ottheme && npm run build-otkit
scripts.build-otkit: npm run build-icons && npm run build-otkit-all && npm run build-otkit-theme-icon
scripts.build-otkit-all: lerna exec --scope otkit-* theo token.yml -- --format scss,cssmodules.css,common.js --dest .
scripts.build-otkit-theme-icon: lerna exec --scope otkit-icons theo token.theme.yml -- --format scss,cssmodules.css,common.js --dest .
scripts.build-ottheme: lerna exec --scope ottheme-* theo token.yml -- --format scss,cssmodules.css,common.js --dest .
scripts.build-styleguide: lerna exec --scope style-guide npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently 'lerna exec --scope style-guide npm run develop' 'npm-watch'
scripts.test: npm run build-icons && lerna exec --scope ot* theo token.yml -- --format scss,cssmodules.css,common.js && lerna exec --scope otkit-icons theo token.theme.yml -- --format scss,cssmodules.css,common.js && npm run unit
scripts.automatic-release: npm run build && node utils/automatic-release && node utils/deploy-styleguide
scripts.automatic-release-test: npm run build && node utils/automatic-release --test && npm run build-styleguide
